name: Maryland Pumpkin Seeds
author: jolly_holly
summary: Toasted pumpkin seeds with Maryland's favorite seasoning!
ingredients: ¼ cup seafood seasoning, such as Old Bay™
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Rinse pumpkin seeds in a colander
Spread out on paper towels and pat dry
Coat a large baking sheet with cooking spray and spread the pumpkin seeds out in a single layer
Spray the tops of the seeds with additional cooking spray
Sprinkle the seafood seasoning evenly over the tops
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven, stirring occasionally, until dry and toasted
Cool for a few minutes before serving
